name: Magico - Magic Heroine Action Game
description:
My personal project after Christmas was to create an Archero inspired game with Magic instead of archery. As I had no prior 3D experience, I gave myself one month to finish the game and upload it to the Google Play Store. It turned out very nice, so I am happy to present it here to you. The Play Store description:

- Smooth and addictive gameplay - The ultimate action experience on mobile.
- Challenging fights - Unique bosses and enemies deliver non-stop challenge and action.
- Beautiful handcrafted environments with varying difficulty.
- Play with a strong heroine, conquer the elements and become the most powerful mage alive!

Go for it. Try this addictive and amazing fantasy game for free and enjoy your
 leisure time like you never did before. We bet you won’t regret your time spent as the heroine fighting with powerful spells in this roguelike RPG game.
 
Download the app now and let us know your experience and feedback. We strive to implement every suggestion from the community! We do our best to make the game better.
Shoot us a suggestion per email at creativecodecampus@gmail.com, use the in game suggestion function or join our discord server at https://discord.gg/64zSe9MWsm. Everybody is welcome!
